headline: Assessing STERIS (STE) Valuation After Recent Mixed Share Performance
summary: Setting the scene for STERIS after recent share performance STERIS (STE) has recently seen mixed share performance, with a small 1 day decline, a modest gain over the past week, but negative returns over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for STERIS. At a share price of $246.74, STERIS shows fading short term momentum with a 30 day share price return of 4.92% and a 90 day share price return of 7.54%. Longer term total shareholder returns of 11.36% over 1 year and 35.11%...
